content: B 12-55 12V Battery Compact, high-capacity 12V 5.0 Ah Li-ion battery with upgraded 21700 cells to deliver more work-per-charge ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Batteries, chargers, and power stations- - - ### FEATURES:Features Balances agility and performance – the most compact 12V power tool battery ever made by Hilti, with up to 25% longer runtime than its predecessor Avoid interruptions to your work – accurate charge level display helps prevent unexpected loss of power, while overheating, overloading and deep discharge protection can cut unplanned downtime Ultra-durable casing – the rubberized, glass-fiber reinforced casing is up to four times more resistant to damage from dropping and twice as resistant to extreme temperatures than standard ABS plastic Upgraded 21700 battery cells – more capacity means significantly more runtime without the need to reach for a larger battery pack Applications Compact, high-capacity 12V battery for use with Hilti cordless tools ### TECHNICAL DATA: Weight: 0.76 lb. Dimensions (LxWxH): 3.7 x 3 x 1.7 mm Working temperature range: 1 - 140 °F Technical Data | Weight | 0.76 lb | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 3.7 x 3 x 1.7 mm ### ITEMS- 2330571 - Battery pack B 12-55 Li-ion - Package Size 1 pc
